item.title: VS code extensions for frontend developers
item.description: Add jsdoc comments Adds simple jsdoc comments for the parameters of a selected function signature Bookmarks Mark lines and jump to them change-case Quickly change the case (camelCase, CONSTANT_CASE, snake_case, etc) of the current selection or current word CSS Peek Allow peeking to css ID and class strings as definitions from html files to respective CSS.
